text: This person is completely useless at their job.
translation: This person is completely useless at their job.

text: Na so dem dey do for here!

translation: I want to buy this car

text: Nwanne, i need your help with this homework
translation: Brother/Sister, i need your help with this homework

text: Kedu why you no show for party yesterday?
translation: Why didn't you come to the party yesterday?

text: Biko, help me with this small thing
translation: Please, help me with this small thing

text: This yeye girl no sabi anything for class
translation: This silly girl doesn't know anything in class

text: Chai! The exam was too hard, o di egwu!
translation: Oh my! The exam was too hard, it's terrible!

text: Eyin boys yi sha, won lazy gan
Nna, your performance dey very poor
translation: Man, your performance is very poor

text: I tell you, that girl na real ada! Smart pass everybody
translation: I tell you, that girl is a real firstborn daughter! Smarter than everyone

text: Abeg, no dey vex. I go send you the money tomorrow.
translation: Please don't be angry. I will send you the money tomorrow.
